git_status.last_commit: 1c69be0 - Add Angular CLI installation script and fix dashboard dependencies (63 minutes ago)

work_context.current_task: Create Angular component for displaying analysis projects
work_context.next_tasks: T045: Create analysis progress component, T046: Create architecture visualization component
work_context.notes: Successfully implemented T044 project list component with Angular 17 standalone components. Created complete Angular workspace configuration (angular.json, tsconfig files), implemented ProjectListComponent with Material Design table, project service with HTTP client, routing configuration, and environment setup. Build successful with 444.66 KB initial bundle. Component features: project listing with status badges, create/view/delete actions, loading/error/empty states, responsive design, and Material UI integration.

resume_instructions: Ensure you're in the project root: cd /workspace
Activate virtual environment if available: source .venv/bin/activate
Review modified files listed in this checkpoint
Review the work context for current tasks and blockers
Use GitHub Copilot with context from .github/copilot-instructions.md

project_goals: Demonstrate migration workflows from monoliths to microservices
Provide intelligent automation through agentic systems
Establish best practices for microservices decomposition
Enable practical implementation with real-world tools
copilot_context.current_phase: Initial phase focusing on development environment, Git workflow, tools structure, and reference codebase integration
